subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Andrew Shaw’s goal for Chicago on Tuesday violated an N.H.L. rule that prohibits goals “directed, batted or thrown into the net by an attacking player other than with a stick.”
snippet: Andrew Shaw’s goal for Chicago on Tuesday violated an N.H.L. rule that prohibits goals “directed, batted or thrown into the net by an attacking player other than with a stick.”
